casebody.data:
MULLIN v. LONG ISLAND R. CO. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. March 4, 1910.) Appeal from Municipal Court, Borough of Queens, First District. Action by Nellie Mullin against the Long Island Railroad Company. From a judgment for plaintiff, defendant appeals. Reversed, and new trial ordered.

Argued before HIRSCHBERG, P. J., and WOODWARD, THOMAS, RICH, and CARR, JJ.

Dominic B. Griffin, for appellant. Gordon Ireland, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment of the Municipal Court reversed, and new trial ordered, costs to abide the event, on the authority of Susan Mullin v. Long Island Railroad Company (decided herewith) 121 N. Y. Supp. 458.
